attributes.action: increase the UK savings protection limit to £50,000 per account with immediate effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister and the Chancellor have both said that they will do what it takes to mitigate the effect of the current global financial crisis. The opposition have said that they will lend such a measure their immediate support. This measure is already promised. Its immediate implementation would demonstrate concern for people who are anxious about the safety of their savings.
